results.title: Global digital asset inflows reached US$47.2bn in 2025, just shy of the 2024 record. Bitcoin saw a 35% decline in flows, with inflows of US$26.9bn in 2025. Ethereum saw the most substantive gains, with inflows of US$12.7bn, up 138% YoY. XRP and Solana saw a rise of 500%
